This test exercises the "go_package_outline" MCP tool.

-- flags --
-mcp

-- go.mod --
module example.com/mod

//@mcptool("go_package_outline", `{"file":"$WORKDIR/main.go","imports":["example.com/mod/lib"]}`, output=outline)

go 1.21

-- main.go --
package main

import "example.com/mod/lib"

func main() {
	println(lib.Foo(0))
}
-- lib/lib.go --
package lib

type T int

func Foo(int) string {
	return ""
}

-- @outline --
"example.com/mod/lib" (package lib)
lib.go:
--->
package lib

type T int

func Foo(int) string

<---
